ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T21:34:31 [Issue ID 4000-38210] urn:comicvine:4000-38210
ComicInfo.Summary:
The final chapter of "World's End!" The travelers of the World's End tavern share one last tale and head to the windows to watch as the reality storm comes to a close...
The time storm ends, and almost everyone of the guests leave. We also see almost all of the Family of endless, walking as great figures in the sky, but we do not get to know why.
Dream does not appear in this issue except on the cover.
Pencillers:
Bryan Talbot, pgs 1-9, 20-24Gary Amaro, pgs 10-19Inkers:
Mark Buckingham, pgs 1-3Dick Giordano, pgs 4-8, 20-22Bryan Talbot, pg 9Tony Harris, pgs 10-19Steve Leialoha, pgs 23-24
